developers.title: Developers
developers.description: Be part of the exciting world of multichain innovation by building EVM and WASM dApps on Astar Network. Astar XVM SDK is the foundation of our multichain smart contracts.

evm.title: EVM compatible
evm.description: Easily launch EVM dApps written in Solidity or Vyper.

wasm.title: WASM dApps
wasm.description: Launch next generation Polkadot native dApps

scalable.title: Scalable
scalable.description: Astar is future-proof and built for scalability.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Astar Network uses the shared security of the Polkadot Relay Chain.

xcm.title: XCM
xcm.description: Interact with other blockchains with trustless bridges.

build2earn.title: Build2Earn
build2earn.description: Use our dApp staking mechanism to support your development on Astar Network.

multichain.title: Multichain Future
multichain.description: Astar Network will be the go-to blockchain for Web3 and beyond by focusing on the key aspect of interoperability.

defi.title: DeFi
defi.description: The quantity and quality of options available for our user base boost our decentralized finance sector. In addition to very low fees and quick transaction speed, our XCM compatibility with other parachains allow for more secure transfers and swaps within our ecosystem.

nft.title: NFT
nft.description: Astar's NFT environment is inviting for small and large communities alike. From personal collections to full-scale projects by renowned Japanese IPs, we have all the tools necessary to help connect the team with the interested communities.

infra.title: Leading Infra Providers
infra.description: Our goal is to provide the most secure and efficient connections to other leading blockchains. Considering the high level of importance this has, we take a rigorous approach when integrating bridges and other infra.

dao.title: DAO
dao.description: Decentralized autonomous organizations are the future. Our community will help mold the shape of the network through means which are transparent and accessible.

toolkit.title: Reach into Astar Developer Toolkit
toolkit.description: All your favorite tools and integrations work natively with Astar.
toolkit.ecosystem: Explore all projects building on Astar

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.ben: Astar is a layer 1 blockchain built on Substrate. Through Polkadot's shared security and XCMP, Astar's progress on WASM support can enable very unique use-cases to the Polkadot ecosystem.
testimonials.miko: One of the most significant problems left unsolved by Satoshi Nakamoto has been to optimize developer incentives for contributing to projects. Astar has shown incredible innovation in this.
testimonials.michael: It's rare that we find teams and products as obssesed with improving Web3 developer experience as we are at Alchemy, but Astar is exactly that. Features like dApp Staking and XCMP are gamechangers for developers, which is why we're so excited to be a part of the Astar ecosystem.
